description.value: Primary Energy: Space 3 (force armor) Supporting Energy: Time 4 (duration 1 hour) Total Cost: 7 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery + Time Potential + Time Mastery (4d8) Effect: Target at touch gains DR 3 (doesn't stack with worn armor). Counts as no armor for purposes of Acrobatic Defense and similar abilities. Saving Throw: None (beneficial buff, willing targets only) Success Scaling: 1 = 10 minutes, 2 = 1 hour, 3 = 8 hours, 4 = DR 4 (24 hours)
